briefdescription.para: Widget representation of the plugin.
Trigger action to start the view plugin editor.
Trigger action to create a screenshot.
Toggle action to setEnabled view isolation (when toggled, all other view plugins are temporarily closed)
Action for toggling whether the view plugin may be closed.
Action for toggling whether the view plugin may float.
Action for toggling whether the view plugin may be moved.
Action for toggling docking options.
Action for toggling whether the view plugin is locked.
Action which determines whether the view plugin is visible or not.
Action for managing presets.
Action for displaying a tooltip for sampled elements.
Shortcut for triggering the plugin.
Additional actions which are added to the end of the settings menu of the view plugin title bar.
Settings actions which are displayed as docking widgets in the interface.
When set and running, a thin progress bar will be displayed on top of the view plugin dock widget.
Pairs of overlay actions and their corresponding overlay widgets.
Constructor.
Perform startup initialization.
Load one (or more) datasets in the view.
Get widget representation of the plugin.
Get whether this plugin is a system view plugin or not.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether this plugin is a system view plugin or not

briefdescription.para: Create screenshot from the view plugin Base implementation grabs the widget and saves it in a user-chosen location.
Get shortcut for triggering the plugin.
Set shortcut for triggering the plugin.
Add action to the title bar menu.
Remove action from the title bar menu.
Get title bar actions.

simplesect.para: List of pointers to title bar actions

memberdef.argsstring: (WidgetAction *dockingAction, WidgetAction *dockToDockingAction=nullptr, gui::DockAreaFlag dockArea=gui::DockAreaFlag::Right, bool autoHide=false, const gui::AutoHideLocation &autoHideLocation=gui::AutoHideLocation::Left, const QSize &minimumDockWidgetSize=QSize(256, 256))
memberdef.name: addDockingAction

briefdescription.para: Add a docking action to the view (the action widget will be docked in the view)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to docking action to add
Pointer to the settings action to dock to (docked top-level if nullptr)
Dock area in which dockToViewPlugin will be docked
Whether to pin the settings action to the border of the view plugin
Location to pin the settings action in case auto-hide is active

briefdescription.para: Get vector of pointers to docking actions.
Add overlayAction to the view (the action widget will be overlaid on top of the view)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to overlay action to add (may not be nullptr)
Alignment of the overlay action in the view

briefdescription.para: Remove overlayAction from the view.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to overlay action to remove (may not be nullptr)

briefdescription.para: Get all overlay actions.

simplesect.para: List of pointers to overlay actions

briefdescription.para: Set target widget for overlay actions to targetWidget (default is the view plugin widget)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to target widget (may not be nullptr)

briefdescription.para: Signals that the progress task changed to progressTask.
